content: तीव्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Severe, intense, sharp, acute, violent, poignant, pungent, impetuous; विलंघिताधोरणतीव्रयत्नाः <ls>R. 5. 48</ls> ‘strong or violent efforts’; &c. <ls>U. 3. 35</ls>; <ls>Ś. 1. 33</ls>, <ls n="Ś.">5. 7.</ls> {@--2@} Hot, warm. {@--3@} Flashing. {@--4@} Pervading. {@--5@} Endless, unlimited. {@--6@} Horrible, dreadful. --व्रः {@--1@} Sharpness. {@--2@} Śiva. --व्रं {@--1@} Heat, pungency. {@--2@} A shore. {@--3@} Iron, steel. {@--4@} Tin. --व्रं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Violently, sharply, excessively.
